field.name: summary
field.value: UseFactoryMethod fails if more than one is registered

field.name: description
field.value:
Registration is using naming 'LateBoundComponent' for key on ComponentModel. Thus, when it tries to build the correct activator it always returns the first one registered. Please see this post: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/browse_thread/thread/445ae0e9b952a707
I'm putting this as critical since it is likely a person would use this method more than once.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''2.5''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
